data.comment: Stoke's Jordan Thompson has been booked in Reading.
In the minute 23, Goal! Tyrese Campbell gives Stoke a 0-1 lead in Reading.
Goal! Steven Fletcher extends Stoke's lead to 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Tommy Smith.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The away team have replaced Nick Powell with Tashan Oakley-Boothe. This is the first substitution made today by Michael O'Neill.
In the minute 63, Michael Olise is replacing Tomas Esteves for Reading at Madejski Stadium.
Sam Baldock is replacing George Puscas for the home team.
Nathan Collins is on a sub for Steven Fletcher for Stoke.
In the minute 74, Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a third substitution, with Sone Aluko replacing Andy Yiadom.
Jacob Brown (Stoke) has replaced the possibly injured Jordan Thompson at Madejski Stadium.
James McClean (Stoke) has received a yellow card from Keith Stroud.
It's 0-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Stoke extend their lead to 0-3 through Jacob Brown.
